Text: General Update Cc Jim and Rob I hope you are both well and was really pleased to see that last weeks merger negotiations reached a successful outcomeThis must have required an incredible effort in the timescale and given everything else that is going onI very much hope this will allow you to enjoy a more stable period after the events of the last few weeksYou both have many friends at Linklaters and we are all pulling for you at this time I also thought you may like to have a brief overview of the main areas in which we are assisting at the momentThese are as follows MergerWe are working with Robert Eickenroht on the UKEuropean antitrust aspectsThis kicked off with a conference call todayGreatly appreciate the instructions Jim DabholWe are continuing our role on Dabhol which is now primarily focused on the litigation side and a major commitment for a partner teamChris Walker is I believe in Houston tomorrow to meet with Bruce Lundstrum and othersInput from the projects side continues principally in relation to Sch PPA but is not likely to be extensive over the next month or so given the current emphasis in India Enron EuropeWe are in close contact with Mark and have a number of ongoing new mattersIn particular we have a dedicated team advising Europe on its position and contingency planning for current circumstancesthis team has been liaising with Mark Haedicke and the Weil Gotchal teamWe are also assisting on some potential disposals in non core business areasOur London secondee remains in place OtherWe have a number of ongoing matters ranging from SEDCO litigation through a bid for LNG purchases from Nigeria LNGGiven the understandable emphasis on cost control at this time it may be that we should review these matters to determine whether you feel it appropriate to scale back legal spend in some areas On the question of paymentwe have invoices totalling more than million outstanding and this level of commitment of course continues to grow in the light of our ongoing workAs mentioned on Friday we do need to reduce this to a more manageable level we are currently speaking with Mark and Bruce in particular to find a way of achieving this and your continuing support in this effort would be greatly appreciated We really want to do all we canat both a personal and professional level to support Enron at this timeI am particularly conscious of the support and friendship you have given to me over the yearsIf there is anything else we can do please do call me at any timeFor convenience my nos are W M H Best Wishes Stuart This message is confidential It may also be privileged or otherwise protected by work product immunity or other legal rules If you have received it by mistake please let us know by reply and then delete it from your system you should not copy the message or disclose its contents to anyone
